experience: You and Roger both know Derek Lanham, Neil Giuliano, and 13 others
When I now joined LinkedIn I wanted to close my account. Most people kept rejecting my connection requests and all my shares go to the LinkedIn graveyard.
This happened 5 years ago. I told my older brother this and he said, if only 20 people like your updates, keep writing for those 20 people.
That was 2012. Fast Forward - Look what happened next:
Check out the Most Liked Post on LinkedIn for 2017 with 265, 000+ likes. https://lnkd.in/dFXm9jh

Many people think they're bad at what they do but they fail to realize that they don't have the right audience while those who seem to be doing well do so because they have the right audience. That's the difference!
On LinkedIn, we are all on a level playing field. You have no excuse. I built my network from scratch against all odds. Don’t be a spectator, get in the game and start networking.
Once I started networking everything changed. Networking is about expanding borders. It's about engaging and building relationships. It’s giving and sharing.
I’ll sum up #LinkedIn in 3 words- Network! Network!! Network!!!
Note - Please follow me. I have reached the limit on my connections and can't accept any more invitations. Thank you for understanding.
“I got a call my wife had been in a serious car accident. I told my
boss I needed to leave immediately. He asked me to give him 10 more
minutes. I was so disappointed because he could have covered for me. I
come in early. I leave late. I hardly take any sick leave and that was
the response I got from him. I looked at him and walked straight out the
door. My relationship with my manager went south after that. I started
planning my exit strategy and within 3 months, I quit."
I received this email from Steve.
Read full post here: Why Loyal Employees Quit - https://lnkd.in/d6tq7Uw
Has empathy become extinct in the business world?
Employers if you want loyalty from employees, you must first give it.
A little respect and compassion goes a long way.
NICE Software Acquires Workflex For Adaptive Workforce Management
Six Wholly Unbelievable Things That Improve Employee Quality Of Life
Agent Retention: The Secret To Improve Customer Experience
NICE Revolutionizes Workforce Management Allowing Organizations to Easily Transform to Adaptive Workforce Engagement

Workflex combines the latest Automatic Call Distributor (ACD) and Workforce Management (WFM) information with agent profile data and automatically applies program-specific business rules to determine the optimum solution to identified staffing and performance variances. WorkFlex then proactively alerts agents, supervisors and workforce administrators with the information they need to improve their effectiveness while improving net staffing levels.The WorkFlex mobile apps and Cloud-based software seamlessly integrate with your Workforce Management system to dynamically fine-tune short-term and longer-term staffing levels. WorkFlex gives your contact center agents anytime/anywhere view of their schedules on their smart phones, and provides them with the tools they need for managing schedule changes and updates.With apps for your Agents, your Supervisors and your Workforce Managers tightly integrated with your Workforce Management and ACD solutions, WorkFlex reduces the stress and costs associated with overstaffing, understaffing, agent absenteeism and turnover, while improving performance and overall agent satisfaction.  Doing this leads to enhanced satisfaction levels for both agents and customers, while reducing operational costs.To see a short video of how the Agent App is used on a smart phone, copy/paste this link in your web browser (no registration required): http://workflexsolutions.com/tech-tank-2017-workflex-mobile-app-demo/Scroll Left and Right using < Previous  Next> to view the videos below:

Adtech Global delivers solutions to help businesses improve their customer service operations and maximize workforce efficiency through both cloud-based and premise-based workforce optimization (WFO) software, intraday automation, and related managed and professional services. As a Verint company, Adtech Global provides consulting, training, monitoring, support and implementation services for the Verint Workforce Optimization suite.I engaged with our clients as a valued business partner providing software licensing, consultation, planning, implementation and support of best-in-class solutions for contact centers from the industry’s best providers.  The bottom line is to use technology to help organizations enhance their engagement with their customers while improving the productivity and happiness of their employees.

Incentive Compensation Management Solutions for Contact Center Managers.  Many Contact Center Managers who pay their agents commissions or other incentives based on the agents' performance, find that process tedious and prone to mistakes.  The Glocent Incentive Compensation Management (ICM) software automates this process and makes sure that agents are paid on time and with accuracy.
Joined several start-up companies (listed below) to build their go-to-market strategy, close their first sales and hire their initial sales teams.

St. Mary's Food Bank Alliance has a special history as the world's first food bank. Founded in 1967, St. Mary's has grown to be one of the world's largest food banks, and an important part of the safety net for people going through a rough patch. St. Mary's distributes enough food for over 250,000 meals per day - about 6 million pounds of food per month!www.FirstFoodBank.orghttp://www.facebook.com/firstfoodbankhttp://twitter.com/stmarysfoodbankhttp://www.youtube.com/smfba

I have known Tim Metzger for over 8 years. I worked with Tim where he was a Key Account Business Developer and Programs Manager for Incentives Compensation Management software for contact centers. Tim is well-liked and respected for his technical and design knowledge, as well as his bilingual skills and his ability to create consensus within a diverse multinational team. Tim’s cheerful enthusiasm was ever-present and greatly appreciated in the often stressful and chaotic startup environment. He always offered a mature, calm, focused perspective, never losing sight of strategic goals, even when requirements seemed to change daily. In a difficult environment, Tim is always able to do what it takes to get the job done. Tim is a hard-working, conscientious, highly competent professional for whom I have no hesitation recommending for your project. I feel he would be an asset to any business.

summary: I am a passionate and effective performer for building and managing territories and key / strategic relationships for technology companies. My primary success is in ramping up reliable revenue streams for small-to-midsize, growth-oriented companies while providing best-in-class solutions for my clients. Over the past 20+ years, I have developed advanced expertise in delivering 21st Century solutions to my public and private sector clients, while developing strong, expanding relationships based on trust and performance.Areas of Expertise:» Enterprise Software Solutions» Professional Services / Managed Services» Operational Process Improvement» Contact Center / Back Office Strategy & Best Practices» Fine-tuning your Operations for success in the 21st Century» Cloud Computing / Software as a Service (SaaS)» Global Workforce Optimization» Understanding the "Voice of the Customer"» Citizen Engagement (Public Sector)» Call Recording & Quality Monitoring» Regulatory Compliance» Customer Relationship Management (CRM)I can be reached at: Roger@RogerLay.com Military: USMC | Aviation Operations Chief
